channel.title: Visio :: K-State CIS 400 Textbook
channel.description: One of the many tools we can use to create UML diagrams is Microsoft Visio. For Kansas State University Computer Science students, this can be downloaded through your Azure Student Portal. Visio is a vector graphics editor for creating flowcharts and diagrams. it comes preloaded with a UML class diagram template, which can be selected when creating a new file: Class diagrams are built by dragging shapes from the shape toolbox onto the drawing surface.
